versions.title: AI Voices & TTS Overhaul
versions.description: ElevenLabs AI voice integration with 4,800+ voices in the marketplace, daily usage limits, and economy bug fixes.

groups.title: ElevenLabs AI Voices
items: 4,843 AI voices available â€” Standard (1 token) and Premium (2 tokens) tiers
3,000 character daily limit per user
Use .changevoice <name> to activate an owned AI voice
Owned voices listed in .changevoice output

groups.title: Marketplace â€” AI Voices Tab
items: New AI Voices tab with 4,800+ browsable voice cards
Live search bar with category filters: All / Standard / Premium / Owned
Gift voices to other users via the card menu
Paginated display â€” 48 cards per page with Load More

groups.title: Help Command
items: TTS section now appears in .cmds index as [tts]
Voice commands (play, stop, joinvc, leavevc) moved to dedicated [vc] section
Media section now only contains GIF and YouTube commands

groups.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed .give @user half â€” 'half' now correctly gives 50% of your balance
Fixed .deposit half and .withdraw half with same correction
Previously 'half' was passed as a literal string causing balance corruption

versions.title: Profile Cards & Theme System
versions.description: Full profile card system, theme marketplace, and XP tracking overhaul.

groups.title: Profile Cards
items: .profile / .p â€” renders your custom profile card
.rep @user â€” give +1 rep (24h cooldown per person)
Card shows level, global rank, XP bar, rep, stats, bio, badges

groups.title: Theme System
items: 14 themes across Standard, Premium, Seasonal & Exclusive tiers
Themes cost Tokens â€” buy & equip from the marketplace website
Each theme has a unique color scheme; 7 have custom pixel-art backgrounds
Exclusive themes (Legend Gold, Founders) are earned, not purchased

groups.title: XP Overhaul
items: XP now tracks server messages + group commands combined
Chat Activity stat shows server messages only
Global XP shows total combined activity
Level-up rank checks use total activity

groups.title: Website
items: Marketplace â€” new Profile Themes tab with category filters
Marketplace â€” new Profile Settings tab (set bio, more coming)
Bio/About set from website, no longer a bot command

versions.title: Quality of Life Update
versions.description: Help command overhaul, shorthand amount support across all economy commands, and leaderboard improvements.

groups.title: Help Command
items: .help now opens an index page listing all categories with shortcut keys
.help <key> jumps directly to a section (e.g. .help f for fishing)
Visual redesign â€” cleaner dividers, section key shown in header

groups.title: Shorthand Amounts
items: All economy & gambling commands now accept k/m/b/t suffixes
Decimal values supported â€” e.g. 2.7m, 1.5k, 0.5b
Applies to: deposit, withdraw, give, rob, bet, flip, slots, blackjack, plinko, mines, ladders, wheel, coinstreak, invest, diffuser, rune

groups.title: Leaderboard
items: Unresolvable users no longer appear as Unknown on the leaderboard
Blacklisted users are marked with ðŸš«

versions.title: Economy Overhaul
versions.description: A sweeping overhaul of core economy and gambling systems â€” fixing broken mechanics, adding real risk/reward, and introducing pets, job levels, and more.

groups.title: Gambling Fixes
items: Slots â€” weighted rarity, fixed pair detection
Coinflip â€” pick heads or tails before flipping
Blackjack â€” 3:2 natural BJ, upfront bet, double down
Spin â€” legendary tier now reachable (~1%), rarity label

groups.title: Mines & Ladders
items: Mines â€” multiplierBoost applied, bonuses on cashout
Mines â€” 5-minute idle timeout forfeits bet
Ladders â€” left/right choice now affects success odds
Rob â€” 70% success chance, catch penalty added

groups.title: New Systems
items: Pet system â€” adopt, train, battle, release
Job levels â€” 10 tiers with XP and multiplier bonuses
Fish encyclopedia â€” .fishbook with seasonal bonuses
Cooldown persistence â€” survive bot restarts

groups.title: Quality of Life
items: Leaderboard â€” total wealth (wallet + bank), rebirth tag
Leaderboard â€” fixed box-drawing borders
Removed stock market system

versions.title: Automation & Web Marketplace
versions.description: Introduction of the Web-based Marketplace and the new Autofishing system.

groups.title: Web Marketplace
items: Discord OAuth login on website
Buy access items online (e.g. Autofish Access)
Refined web UI

groups.title: Autofishing
items: Unlock Autofishing from the Marketplace
Bot automatically fishes for you while active
Includes a 2-hour daily usage limit

groups.title: Commands
items: .autofish on|off â€” Toggle auto-fishing

versions.title: Fishing Overhaul
versions.description: Major fishing system overhaul â€” mythical tier fish, random cast events, streak bonuses, bait consumables, and a fully reworked stat display.

groups.title: New Fish & Tiers
items: Mythical tier â€” 4 ultra-rare fish (5Mâ€“50M coins)
2 new legendary fish added
4 new rare fish (Void Eel, Abyssal Angler...)
8 new common/uncommon fish

groups.title: Cast Events
items: Double catch â€” reel in two at once
Treasure â€” find bonus coins on the line
Lucky cast â€” rare chance doubled that throw
Escape, storm, shark, junk events

groups.title: Streak & Bait
items: Streak system â€” up to 3x value at 100 casts
Bait consumables (Worm to Cosmic Bait)
.fishshop buy <bait> to purchase bait
All 55 rods now have rare-chance scaling

versions.title: Dice Duel PvP Gambling
versions.description: Player-vs-player dice gambling. Challenge others to high-stakes dice rolls to test your luck.

groups.title: Dice Duel
items: Challenge players to dice duels
60s time limit to accept
Higher roll wins the bet
Ties â€” no coins exchanged

groups.title: Details
items: Support for all/half betting
Balance verification
30s cooldown between rounds
Visual dice roll results

versions.title: Romance & Economy Expansion
versions.description: Major romance system expansion with new gambling games and enhanced fishing economy impacts.

groups.title: Romance
items: Items affect romance success
Protection items included
Mood enhancers
.stopuse command

groups.title: Economy Games
items: Coin Flip â€” double or nothing
Bank Heist â€” team robberies
Fishing â€” new rare catches

versions.title: Advanced Upgrade System
versions.description: Seven unique upgrades enhancing every aspect of gameplay progression and efficiency.

groups.title: Upgrades
items: Lucky Gambler â€” +12% winnings
Robbery Protection â€” -15% losses
Bank Interest â€” 0.5% daily
Energy Booster â€” -10% cooldowns
